message: Sry I won't be buying it tho so I can't join you in game :-(
I was pretty impressed by the beta actually.  The rift events were downtown crazyville.

the rifts seemed to act like a shortcut to endgame content.  I only played for about 3 hours total and I was doing the equivalent of a 70+ person raid in the middle of like the second town in the game
I'm interested in 1. if this game is worth buying/playing and 2. if any teh pwn members would want to form a group/guild/clan (w/e).

I don't really have much fate in this game.  I have a feeling it's going to fail like most MMOs out there that says they'll be the next WoW killer.  I might try it in a few months once I see how well i does.  As of now, WoW will be enough of an MMO for me even though I'm not subscribed right now.
im probably gonna skip over everything til SWtOR comes out anyway...was just checkin to see if it blew anyones mind
I heard we werent in azeroth anymore but i dont know if that a good thing :/
